attributes.action: TELL US how many elected MPs and unelected Peers have direct financial links with companies allocated fracking licences.
attributes.additional_details: It will be particularly interesting to see if the dishonourable member Tim Yeo is as deeply embroiled with Shale Gas as he is with wind turbines, for which he had ministerial responsibilities?

rejection.details: This is a matter for the House authorities and not for Government.
